title: Getting Started with ImprovedFileTreeUI
description: A comprehensive guide on setting up and using the ImprovedFileTreeUI component in a Next.js application.
author: Anonymous

blocks.content: Before you begin, ensure you have the following installed:

Node.js
Next.js
React
Framer Motion
Lucide React
TypeScript
Follow these steps to set up the ImprovedFileTreeUI component in your Next.js application.

npx create-next-app@latest my-next-app
cd my-next-app
npm install framer-motion lucide-react
Create a new file named ImprovedFileTreeUI.tsx in your components directory.
To use the ImprovedFileTreeUI component in your application, follow these steps:
Now you can use the ImprovedFileTreeUI component in your main page.
With these steps, you have successfully set up the ImprovedFileTreeUI component in your Next.js application. You can now manage files more effectively!
